description.en: Baby tiger that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.ar: Baby tiger that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.br: Um tigre que segue seu dono e coleta itens caídos.
description.cns: 老虎宝宝跟随它的主人并捡起周围掉落的物品。
description.de: Ein starker Tiger, der seinem Herrchen folgt und Gegenstände aufsammelt.
description.fi: Baby tiger that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.fil: Baby tiger that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.fr: invoque un petit tigre qui suit son maître et ramasse les objets laissés par les ennemis
description.id: Baby tiger imut yang setia mengikuti pemiliknya berkeliling dan mengambil barang-barang drop.
description.it: Baby tiger that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.jp: キプラタイガーを召喚し、ドロップしたアイテムを拾ってくれる収集ペット
description.kr: 용맹한 호랑이를 소환하거나 해제합니다. 소환 하였을 시, 주변에 있는 아이템을 자동 습득하게 됩니다.
description.nl: Baby tiger that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.pl: Baby tiger that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.ru: Очаровательный тигренок, который послушно семенит за хозяином и подбирает предметы.
description.sp: Tigre bebé que persigue a su dueño y recoge los objetos soltados.
description.sw: Baby tiger that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.th: Baby tiger ที่ตามเจ้าของไปรอบๆ และหยิบของที่หล่นลงมา
description.tw: 可以召喚或解除勇猛的老虎。功能：自動撿取掉落在周圍的物品。
description.vi: Chú hổ con đi theo chủ nhân của nó xung quanh và nhặt những món đồ bị đánh rơi.
